Solicitation Title: Radio Receiver in support of the CL-415 aircraft
Description Text: The Defense Logistics Agency, Aviation Wing, Robins AFB, GA, will acquire replenishment spare parts (RT-5000 Radio Receiver) applicable to the CL-415 helicopter.This is a sole source requirement under FAR 6.302-1 for Cobham Management Services, Inc., Chelton Avionics, Inc., DBA Wulfsberg Electronics. Cobham is the OEM for this part. NSN: 5821-01-552-8993HL P/N: 400-015525-0101NOUN: Radio ReceiverThis item is used for reception of radio frequency electromagnetic waves transmitted through space, exclusive of countermeasure, facsimile, loran, radar, television, and other specialized systems. The Government does not own the data. This is a commercial item. SPRWA1-19-Q-0039 is for a firm-fixed price contract with a 10-month (approximate) period of performance. Detailed drawings are not available from the procuring activity.This is a combined synopsis/solicitation. A written RFQ is attached to this posting. This attached RFQ includes delivery, shipping, and packaging requirements.IAW FAR 5.207(c)(16)(ii), all responsible sources may submit a capability statement, proposal, or quotation, which shall be considered by the agency.Electronic responses are required for this solicitation.
NAICS Title: Other Aircraft Parts and Auxiliary Equipment Manufacturing
